[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@dinofe/xt-core](./xt-core.md) &gt; [createHttp](./xt-core.createhttp.md)

## createHttp() function

根据配置创建 HTTP 实例

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createHttp(config: HttpConfig): XApisauceInstance;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [HttpConfig](./xt-core.httpconfig.md) | 配置项 |

**Returns:**

[XApisauceInstance](./xt-core.xapisauceinstance.md)

返回 HTTP 实例

## Example

简单示例一：

```ts
import { createHttp } from '@dinofe/xt-core/http'
const http = createHttp({
 baseURL: '/api-abc',
 useEncrypt: true,
 useSign: true,
 appKey: '3a2e424c56754e90a8948b74f163f0cb',
 encryptVersion: '2',
 commonParams: () => ({
   appId: '3130042001040',
   deviceId: 'xxx_h5',
   merNoNo: '130042001040'
 }),
 onFail: (msg) => {
   log(msg)
 },
 onInvalidToken: (res) => {
   log('Token已失效', res.code, res.msg)
 }
})
http.post('/user/bankQuickLogin', { openid: '1652454242' }).then(res => { console.log(res) })
```
